settings.content:
Fast Shipping With a Cloud9linens Account

Please refer to your estimated arrival date in checkout once the shipping method is selected.

Free Extended Holiday Returns & Exchanges

Purchases made between October 18, 2023, and December 23, 2023, are eligible to be returned
until January 31, 2024. Personalized items and gift boxes cannot be returned.

Shipping & Returns

Cloud9linens Account members receive free Fast shipping. Sign In / Join (Details)

In addition to our regular shipping services, we also oer Buy Online, Pick Up in Store; Ship to
Store; Same Day Delivery; and UPS Store/UPS Access Point Pickup for your convenience.

Gifting Services

Add our luxurious navy box with signature gold foil lettering and a personalized
message at checkout.

settings.custom_liquid:
<style>.transparent-on-top img.inline-block.lazyautosizes.lazyloaded, .transparent-on-top img.inline-block.lazyautosizes.ls-is-cached.lazyloaded {
    filter: unset;
}
.header__22 .transparent-on-top header .sf-menu-logo-bar ul.sf-nav li a {
    color: #041e3a;
}
.header__22 .icon-fill{
    fill: #000;
  }
.cus-col-container .sf__collection-container.block.mt-0.md\:mt-2\.5.lg\:mb-15.lg\:pt-7.sidebar__collapse {
    padding-top: 6rem;
}
.mw_breadcurmb_main {
    padding-top: 60px;
}
main#MainContent {
    padding-top: 60px !important;
}
.header__22:not(.stuck) .icon-fill-cart {
    filter: unset;
}
.header__22:not(.stuck) .icon-fill-serch {
    stroke: #000;
}
.cus-hdr .mobile____menu, .mob-logo-container img {
    filter: unset;
}
</style>
